entry.def: Skeletal means relating to the bones in your body.

entry.tran: 骨瘦如柴的;皮包骨头的
entry.def: A skeletal person is so thin that you can see their bones through their skin.

example.tran: 住满了骨瘦如柴的儿童的医院

entry.def: Something that is skeletal has been reduced to its basic structure.

example.ex: Passenger services can best be described as skeletal.
example.tran: 对乘客的服务已经少到不能再少。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or forming or attached to a skeleton;
2. very thin especially from disease or hunger or cold;

sentences.sentence: "a nightmare population of gaunt men and skeletal boys"
"kept life in his wasted frame only by grim concentration"
